meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves La Mesa - Apartments in La Mesa, CA

div.span: Value Living In sunny San Diego County, there is eaves La Mesa – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. Our community offers quality La Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like a stackable washer and dryer in each apartment as well as a private patio or balcony. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, brings high-speed internet, powered by Cox Communications, pre-installed in all apartments upon move-in and billed with your monthly rent. All in all, our selection of amazing apartments in La Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? La Mesa Apartments by eaves La Mesa is an excellent place to make your home and you deserve an equally wonderful apartment while you live there. Nestled between the Mission Valley and South Bay Freeways, eaves La Mesa provides easy access not only to Downtown San Diego, but also Mission Valley, Mid-City, Spring Valley and El Cajon. This ideal location also allows residents to explore various entertainment options such as the Grossmont Shopping Center, Regal Cinemas and Harry Griffin Regional Park. If you’re looking for a delicious bite to eat within walking distance you are in luck as Shizouka Japanese Restaurant, Brigantine Seafood Restaurant, New York Giant Pizza and other restaurants are all less than a mile away. Some of the area's most notable attractions and events include the La Mesa Village Farmer's Market, the Walkway of the Stars and the Back to the 50s Car Show. La Mesa Apartment Community All your requirements are met perfectly through every convenience and comfort imaginable. You will discover amazing amenities such as a fitness center and covered carports with plenty of guest parking. We’ll take care of any problems that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in La Mesa today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: 2 beds • 2 baths • 947 sqft • Available Furnished • Classic Package

Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living In sunny San Diego County, there is eaves La Mesa – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. Our community offers quality La Mesa apartments with a few little extras, like a stackable washer and dryer in each apartment as well as a private patio or balcony. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, brings high-speed internet, powered by Cox Communications, pre-installed in all apartments upon move-in and billed with your monthly rent. All in all, our selection of amazing apartments in La Mesa offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? La Mesa Apartments by eaves La Mesa is an excellent place to make your home and you deserve an equally wonderful apartment while you live there. Nestled between the Mission Valley and South Bay Freeways, eaves La Mesa provides easy access not only to Downtown San Diego, but also Mission Valley, Mid-City, Spring Valley and El Cajon. This ideal location also allows residents to explore various entertainment options such as the Grossmont Shopping Center, Regal Cinemas and Harry Griffin Regional Park. If you’re looking for a delicious bite to eat within walking distance you are in luck as Shizouka Japanese Restaurant, Brigantine Seafood Restaurant, New York Giant Pizza and other restaurants are all less than a mile away. Some of the area's most notable attractions and events include the La Mesa Village Farmer's Market, the Walkway of the Stars and the Back to the 50s Car Show. La Mesa Apartment Community All your requirements are met perfectly through every convenience and comfort imaginable. You will discover amazing amenities such as a fitness center and covered carports with plenty of guest parking. We’ll take care of any problems that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in La Mesa today.","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fO9BRoMH6V3rO","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/XIQXOTIGG5DALHKPSHMLU3N5DY.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fbXR3zMH6V30u","customFields":{"title":"this is the real deal. \nthis is eaves."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fzRACrMH6V3p6","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"our staff.","link":"/","description":"Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment.
